title: Fair trade and ethical sourcing certifications
personalDataVerified: Producer cooperative name, farmer groups, certification body, product type, certification date, audit date
personalDataVisible: Certification status (active/suspended/expired). Link to certification body system (retailers and importers, requires authentication)
rationale: Consumer verification of fair trade claims in retail settings. Domain binding prevents fake fair trade certifications and greenwashing. Transparency for ethical consumers who want to verify claims. Critical for premium products where fair trade certification justifies higher prices. Prevents fraudulent use of fair trade marks.
